Mixing Ingredients: Before starting, combine sugar, eggs, and cream in a large bowl.

Baking Time: For approximately 30 to 40 minutes or until the <strong>bubbles have appeared on the surface. While waiting for this, check the jelly roll pan

Cooling Down: To prevent uneven cooling and ensure it stays in shape, let it cool completely. Allow the lighter color layer to set.

Letting Rest: Once that has happened, gently fold the two sides together with a clean knife or spatula over all "frosting".
